再出場: (さいしゅつじょう) - {sumo} return to tournament after temporary absence
再出発: (さいしゅっぱつ) - restart; fresh start
再十両: (さいじゅうりょう) - {sumo} wrestler re-promoted to juryo division
再受浸: (さいじゅしん) - rebaptism by immersion
再変: (さいへん) - second change; second calamity
再実行時間: (さいじっこうじかん) - rerun time
再審: (さいしん) - {law} retrial/reopening of a case; review/reexamination
再審裁判所: (さいしんさいばんしょ) - court of review; retrial court
再審請求: (さいしんせいきゅう) - {law} petition for retrial; appeal for retrial
再就職支援: (さいしゅうしょくしえん) - outplacement
再履: (さいり) - repeating a course; taking a course again
再履修: (さいりしゅう) - repeating a course; taking a course again
再帰代名詞: (さいきだいめいし) - reflexive pronoun
再帰的に呼ぶ: (さいきてきによぶ) - to call recursively
再帰的サブルーチン: (さいきてきサブルーチン) - recursive subroutine
再帰的定義: (さいきてきていぎ) - recursive definitions
再度: (saido) - duas vezes, de novo, segunda vez
再度弁論: (さいどべんろん) - repleading; pleading again
再度確認: (さいどかくにん) - reconfirmation; double check
再建計画: (さいけんけいかく) - reorganization plan; reorganisation plan; restructuring plan
再従兄: (さいじゅうけい) - elder second cousin
再従兄妹: (はとこ) - (yoji) (はいとこ is Tohoku dialect)  second cousin
再従兄弟: (はいとこ) - (yoji) (はいとこ is Tohoku dialect)  second cousin
再従姉妹: (さいじゅうけいてい) - (yoji) (はいとこ is Tohoku dialect)  second cousin
再従姉弟: (はとこ) - (yoji) (はいとこ is Tohoku dialect)  second cousin
再従弟: (さいじゅうてい) - younger second cousin
再感染: (さいかんせん) - getting the same sickness
再手術: (さいしゅじゅつ) - reoperation; repeat surgery; second surgery; surgical revision
再投稿: (さいとうこう) - redraft; redraught; revised contribution; repost (e.g. to a newsgroup)
再拝: (さいはい) - bowing twice/worshipping again; (epistolary closing formula)  Yours sincerely/Yours truly/Sincerely yours
再掲: (さいけい) - to reproduce; to reprint
再整理: (さいせいり) - rearrangement; reorganization; recounting (an event)
再映: (さいえい) - rerun; reshow; revive (a movie)
再服役: (さいふくえき) - re-enlistment; second imprisonment
再来: (さいらい) - return/coming back; second coming (e.g. of Christ)/second advent/reincarnation
再来週: (さらいしゅう) - week after next
再案: (さいあん) - second plan; second draft; second draught
再検討: (さいけんとう) - re-examination; review; reappraisal
